title: Calories in 6 oz Chicken Breast
meta_description: Discover calories in 6 oz chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, per-100g breakdown, and simple tweaks for your meal prep.
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 6 oz ≈ 170 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast has ~281 kcal and ~53 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 6 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 281 kcal for 6 oz (170 g) skinless, boneless, cooked chicken breast.

faqs.q: How much protein in 6 oz chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked. Raw weight is higher; cooking reduces weight by ~25% due to moisture loss.

faqs.q: What affects calories in chicken breast most?
faqs.a: Skin, added oils, breading, or sauces increase calories significantly.

faqs.q: Per 100 g calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: ≈165 kcal, 31 g protein, 3.6 g fat, 0 g carbs per 100 g cooked skinless chicken breast.
